DOC.detailed_description: VelaShape non-invasive ( break skin ) device Body Reshaping Cellulite Treatment . VelaShape combine control infrared ( IR ) light conduct bipolar radiofrequency ( RF ) energies mechanical manipulation . The CoolSculpt System noninvasive device reduces fat freeze fat cell break apart .
